name: MatchyGotchy Z
description: MatchyGotchy Z is a colorful digital pet game that combines idle clicker elements with a new take on pet-raising simulation: trainable personalities. All the nostalgia of those old virtual pets, fully adapted into a new desktop gaming experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo / AMD® Athlon™ Graphics: Nvidia® / AMD® with 1 GB memory DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX® 11 compatible
